article.para: Note that the following list consists only of animated and live action works.

sect2.title: Before we jump into the various timeline, What is a Gundam?
sect2.para: Gundam is a super high-performance mobile suit (MS) that is built combining the top-level existing technology with the most recent and powerful experimental technology available at the time they were built. In other words, they're built to be having much higher performance in every way than the standard mass-production MS. Furthermore, the definition of a Gundam differs in every timeline and is used as an acronym to refer to something. However, within the latest series, these acronyms were derived after the fact and doesn’t appear at any point within the animated works.

sect1.title: Universal Century (UC)
sect1.para: Universal Century, also often being called as the "UC" by Gundam fans is the English name for the original timeline of the Gundam series. It's Japanese name was "Uchuu Seiki", which translate to "Space Era". The Universal Century is currently the most developed timeline containing the most amount of content.

listitem.para: UC0068 - UC0079 - Mobile Suit Gundam The Origin (2015-2018) [OVA] / Advent of the Red Comet (2019) [TV Series]
UC0079 - Mobile Suit Gundam (1979-1980) [TV Series] / The Movie (1981), Soldiers of Sorrow (1982), Encounters in Space (1982) [Compilation Movies]
UC0079 - UC0080 - Mobile Suit Gundam 0080: War in the Pocket (1989) [OVA]
UC0083 - Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory (1991-1992) [OVA] / The Afterglow of Zeon (1992) [Compilation Movie]
UC0087 - Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam (1985-1986) [TV Series] / Heir to the Stars (2005), Lovers (2005), Love Is the Pulse of the Stars (2006) [Compilation Movies]
UC0088 - Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ (1986-1987) [TV Series]
UC0093 - Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack (1988) [Animated Movie]
UC0096 - Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn (2010-2014) [OVA] / RE:0096 (2016) [Compilation TV Series]
UC0097 - Mobile Suit Gundam Narrative (2018) [Animated Movie]
UC0105 - Mobile Suit Gundam Hathaway Hathaway's Flash (2021), Hathaway's Flash 2 (TBA), Hathaway's Flash (TBA) [Animated Movies]
UC0123 - Mobile Suit Gundam F91 (1991) [Animated Movie]
UC0153 - Mobile Suit Victory Gundam (1993-1994) [TV Series]
UC0223 - G-Saviour (2000) [Live Action TV Movie]

sect1.title: Future Century (FC)
sect1.para: Future Century is the ongoing timeline where the Mobile Fighter G Gundam series and its related content are taking place at.

listitem.para: Future Century 60: Mobile Fighter G Gundam (1994–1995) [TV Series]

sect1.para: Coming Soon

sect1.title: After Colony / Mars Century (AC / MC)
sect1.para: After Colony, often abbreviated as "AC”, is the timeline when the Mobile Suit Gundam Wing series are going on. On the other hand, Mars Century which abbreviated as "MC", is the continuation of the After Colony timeline used on Mars.

listitem.para: After Colony 195: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing (1995–1996) [TV Series] / Operation Meteor (1996) [OVA] / Frozen Teardrop Picture Drama - Aratanaru Tatakai (2014) [Special Edition]
After Colony 196: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz (1997) [OVA] / Special Edition (1998) [Compilation Movie]

sect1.para: Coming Soon

sect1.title: After War (AW)
sect1.para: The setting of the After War timeline is set after an apocalyptic war world. It also features many similarities with the Universal Century such as the featuring of Newtype. It is also the only timeline other than the Universal Century that features Newtype.

listitem.para: After War 15: After War Gundam X (1996) [TV Series]

sect1.para: Coming Soon

sect1.title: Correct Century (CC)
sect1.para: Correct Century or CC is the timeline where the Turn A Gundam series take place. Its Japanese name, 'Seireki', is a wordplay on the Japanese term for the Common Era (C.E.) Western calendar system (西暦; also pronounced Seireki). Its kanji literally means "Correct Calendar".

listitem.para: Correct Century 2343-2345: ∀ Gundam (1999-2002) [TV Series] / Earth Light (2002), Moonlight Butterfly (2002) [Compilation Movies]

sect1.para: Coming Soon

sect1.title: Cosmic Era (CE)
sect1.para: Cosmic Era often abbreviated as "C.E." is the timeline where the Gundam SEED series and its related content takes place. It is also the only Gundam timeline other than the Universal Century with multiple TV series.

listitem.para: Cosmic Era 71: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED (2002-2003) [TV Series] / The Empty Battlefield (2004), The Far-Away Dawn (2004), The Rumbling Sky (2004), After-Phase Between the Stars (2004), SEED Supernova - Tanekyara Gekijou (2007) [Special Edition]

Cosmic Era 73-74: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Destiny (2004-2005) [TV Series] / Final Plus: The Chosen Future (2004) [OVA] / The Shattered World (2006), Their Respective Swords(2006), Flames of Destiny(2006), The Cost of Freedom (2007) [Special Edition]

sect1.title: Anno Domini (AD)
sect1.para: Anno Domini or abbreviated as "AD" is a timeline where the events of Gundam 00 take place. This timeline is interesting as it uses Gregorian calendar to record the events instead of the normal Gundam timeline calander.

listitem.para: A.D. 2307-2308: Mobile Suit Gundam 00 (1st Season) (2007-2008) [TV Series]
A.D. 2312: Mobile Suit Gundam 00 (2nd Season) (2008-2009) [TV Series] / Special Edition (2009-2010) [OVA] / Tenshitachi no Kiseki (2008) [Special Edition]
A.D. 2314: Mobile Suit Gundam 00 The Movie - Awakening of the Trailblazer- (2010) [Movie]

sect1.title: Advanced Generation (AG)
sect1.para: Advanced Generation, often abbreviated as "AG" is the timeline where the Gundam AGE series take place.

listitem.para: A.G. 115 – 164: Mobile Suit Gundam AGE (2012) [TV Series]
A.G. 141 – 164: Mobile Suit Gundam AGE: Memory of Eden (2013) [OVA]

sect1.para: Coming Soon

sect1.title: Regild Century (RC)
sect1.para: Regild Century era is the timeline of Gundam Reconguista in G takes place. Chronologically, it was set to be roughly 1000 years and 500 years after the Universal Century and the Correct Century ended.

listitem.para: Regild Century 1014: Gundam Reconguista in G (2014-2015) [TV Series] / Movie I - Ike! Core Fighter (2019), Movie II - Bellri Gekishin (2020), Movie III - Uchuu kara no Isan (2021), Movie IV (TBA), Movie V (TBA) [Compilation Movies] / From the Past to the Future (2015) [Special Edition]

sect1.para: Coming Soon

sect1.title: Post Disaster (PD)
sect1.para: Post Disaster era is the timeline where Gundam IRON-BLOODED ORPHANS takes place. The setting of the timeline is 300 years after a devastating war that was given the name “Calamity War”.

listitem.para: Post Disaster 323: Mobile Suit Gundam IRON-BLOODED ORPHANS (1st Season) (2015-2016) [TV Series]
Post Disaster 325: Mobile Suit Gundam IRON-BLOODED ORPHANS (2nd Season) (2016-2017) [TV Series]

sect1.para: Coming Soon

sect1.title: Build Fighters (BF)
sect1.para: Build Fighters, often being abbreviated as BF, is a fictional timeline in the Gundam franchise where the Gundam Build Fighters series and its related content take place. The setting of the timeline is to be as close to the real world, except the biggest thing at that world is Gunpla building and battle.

listitem.para: Gundam Build Fighters (2013-2014) [TV Series] / Battlogue (2017), GM's Counterattack (2017) [ONA] / SD Kishi Fighters First Half (2014), SD Kishi Fighters Second Half (2014), A Letter (2014) [Special Edition]
Gundam Build Fighters Try (2014-2015) [TV Series] / Island Wars (2016) [OVA]
Gundam Build Divers (2018) [TV Series] / Prologue (2018), Battlogue (2020) [ONA]
Gundam Build Divers Re:Rise (2019-2020) [ONA]
Gundam Build Real (2021) [Live-action Net Drama]

sect1.title: Unknown Timeline (UT)
sect1.para: Unknown Timeline is a timeline i created to sort all the series that currently isn't in any timeline.

listitem.para: SD Gundam Sangokuden Brave Battle Warriors (2010-2011) [TV Series]
Chou Deneiban SD Gundam Sangokuden Brave Battle Warriors (2010) [Animated Movie]
SD Gundam World: Sangoku Souketsuden (2019-2021) [ONA]
SD Gundam World Heroes (2021) [ONA ]
